eu_initiatives: Occupational Safety, Chemical Legislation, Product Safety, Environmental- and Health Protection, REACH Registration, ECHA Call for evidence and information on the intentional uses of microplastic particles in products of any kind
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The Polyelectrolyte Producers Group (PPG) is the official association representing companies which manufacture polyelectrolytes in Europe. PPG was formed to further pursue common interests in the safety of polyelectrolyte products. 
Our purpose is to achieve increased understanding of the benefits of polyelectrolytes to society and to highlight their contribution to our modern way of life. 
We support individual companies and the industry in our committment to work to the highest safety and quality standards and environmental responsibility. We aim to ensure that this approach to responsible product stewardship is acknowledged.
legal_status: Registered as EEIG in Belgium, No  860986450
